[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: AssignmentOperation(
                Assign {
                    left: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    1,
                                ),
                                name: "foo",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    span: Span(
                        3,
                        6,
                    ),
                    right: Include {
                        span: Span(
                            3,
                            8,
                        ),
                        kind: Require,
                        path: Concat {
                            left: MagicConst {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    16,
                                ),
                                constant: Directory,
                            },
                            span: Span(
                                3,
                                24,
                            ),
                            right: LiteralString {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    26,
                                ),
                                value: "/foo.php",
                            },
                        },
                    },
                },
            ),
            semicolon: Span(
                3,
                36,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
